info.name: SDMB: Make "1st new post" buttons easier to use
info.description:
For the Straight Dope Message Board (http://boards.straightdope.com/).

Makes the "Go to first new post" button (used to jump to the first unread post in a thread) bigger and easier to see and click on.
info.additionalInfo: Mar 04, 2001:  Updated style to work with Chrome
